sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Product Performance default">93e3bed97763011061b80bbc3c5a991e</macroponent><name>stylized_text_262/text</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 * @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
 */
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    var indicator = api.data.getmetricsofciodashboard.output.VerticalA.supportingMetrics[0].metricSysid;
    var breakdown = api.data.getmetricsofciodashboard.output.VerticalA.supportingMetrics[0].breakdownSysid;

    var breakdown_arr = [api.state.tab3PISBreakdown, api.state.tab3PortfolioBreakdown, ''];
    var breakdownsourcesysid = breakdown_arr.find(el => el !== '') || '';

    return JSON.stringify(breakdownsourcesysid);

    var element_arr = [api.state.tab3PISElement ,api.state.tab3PortfolioElement];
    var dropdownelementsysid = element_arr.find(el => el !== '');

    var breakdown = [];
    if (breakdownsourcesysid != '') {
        breakdown = [
              {
                "sysId": breakdownsourcesysid,
                "element_sys_ids": [
                  dropdownelementsysid
                ]
              }
            ]
    } else {
        breakdown = [];
    }

  return JSON.stringify(breakdown);
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>VelentL</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-02-29 12:41:31</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>17a082931be48a90d9e4a755bd4bcbd3</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>stylized_text_262/text</sys_name><sys_package display_value="CIO Dashboard" source="sn_ciodashboard">9f21ea597723011061b80bbc3c5a9931</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="CIO Dashboard">9f21ea597723011061b80bbc3c5a9931</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_17a082931be48a90d9e4a755bd4bcbd3</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>VelentL</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-02-29 13:18:26</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>transform</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
